project_abstract.cdata: The Modernization of the State Technical Assistance Project will assist the Government in: 1) improving the framework, procedures and systems for public sector financial management and control; 2) laying the strategic foundation and providing initial support for restructuring the public sector, creating the basis for greater managerial efficiency and operational effectiveness; and 3) providing efficiency, sutainability, and transparency to the Government's public sector reform efforts. The project will finance consultant services, computer equipment and software, training, materials and incremental operating costs for: a) a public financial management and control program which includes: a budget system; a public credit system; Government accounting and treasury; auditing; public contracting; a payroll and personnel system; and supporting information systems; b) a public sector modernization program which includes: activities aimed at futher development and strengthening of the strategic planning function; the design, planning and implementation of public sector restructuring and management strengthening; and related public sector training; and c) coordination of the reform program.
